EmailTemplate.name: Octurbofest 2015.Post Octurbofest Survey.Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: What Did You Think?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/Octurbofest2015> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, Thats a wrap for Octurbofest 2015! Thank you for attending this year's event, we were blown away by the presentations from VMTurbo customers and partners alike and we hope that you were too! What are your thoughts on this year's Octurbofest? <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/Octurbofest2015> After all it's customers and partners like you who make this event what it is! <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/Octurbofest2015> Be sure to keep an eye out for the Octurbofest recordings and presentations that we will be sending out next week! -The VMTurbo Team
